title: Libbitcoin Explorer’s Version 3.x faces severe security breach, users’ funds endangered
description: Blockchain security firm SlowMist has issued a cautionary blog post alerting users to a critical vulnerability within version 3.x of the widely-utilized Libbitcoin Explorer. This vulnerability has raised concerns about the security of various cryptocurrency wallets and reportedly resulted in an approximate loss of $900,000, as reported by Milk Sad. title: Binance CEO CZ Responds to Security Concerns of Wallets
description:
In a recent Twitter exchange, Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao, popularly known as CZ, weighed in on the security risks associated with self-custody wallets while reiterating his support for the concept under one crucial condition: users need to understand what they are doing. CZ’s tweet was prompted by concerns raised by technical writer David A. Harding, […]
